Personally, I think it is a Chinese replica. A much better effort than most=
 of the junk coming from China, but it just doesn't look right. The nakago =
is very poorly done, the habaki is off, the boshi is mishaped and I think i=
t is brightly polished just to keep it a mystery. Plus it violates the prim=
ary rule for buying sword stuff from Ebay, which is NEVER buy anything from=
 China.....
